components.title: Tobacco Submission Package Information
components.tooltip:
• To edit the package information for this submission, navigate to View/Edit Package Information from the Search/View Submissions screen
  • Note - If more than one STN was generated from this package, changes will be made to each submission.
components.label: Panel
Submission Organization (As-Submitted)
components.tooltip: • Enter the Company Name (applicant) that was represented in the submission or select the name using the Look Up tool.

components.label: Submitter Name
components.tooltip: • Enter the Submitter Company Name (applicant) that was represented in the submission or select the name using the Look Up tool. The submitter company name is often found on the submission envelope or in the cover letter.

components.label: Date Submitted
components.tooltip: • The date on the cover letter of the submission. If there is no letter date, the DCC will use the postmark or the shipping label date. For ESG submissions, it is the sent date which overrides the letter date.

components.label: Date Received
components.tooltip: • The earliest FDA stamp date of the submission.

validate.customMessage: Date Received can't precede Date Submitted

components.label: Submission Format
components.tooltip:
• Filter by the Format in which the submission was submitted.
    • Options include:
    • ESG - If the submission is sent via the ESG.
    • Digital Media - If the submission is sent on physical media such as CD, DVD, USB, hard drive. If there is an ink signed cover letter or other paper documents that are also included as files on the physical media, then the submission should be identified as Digital Media.
    • Mixed Media - If the submission is paper and electronic. There are paper documents that are not included as electronic files or electronic files that are not duplicated in paper. Both paper and electronic files are required to make a complete submission. For example, a paper form was submitted with a CD containing files. The paper form was not one of the files on the CD.
    • Paper - If the entire submission is paper.

components.label: Courier
components.tooltip: • Select the type of Courier that delivered the submission. For ESG submissions this field is populated with the value 'ESG'.

components.label: Courier Tracking Number
components.tooltip: • Enter the courier tracking number found on the submission package. For ESG submissions this field is populated with the ESG Core ID for the submission.

data.custom:
values = Promise.resolve([
  'Review Issue', 
  'Other Technical', 
  'Processing On Hold',
  'IT Security'
  ])

trigger.javascript:
categories = [
  'Parent STN was found in the CTP eSubmissions database in an inactive status',
  'PDF Attachment is Password Protected',
  'PMTA Document Page Count 20 or less',
  'Premarket submission contains Non-English characters in Data Fields',
  'Premarket submission contains PDF attachments in Non-English language',
  'Premarket Submission is missing Responsible Official Signatures',
  'Premarket Submission is missing Responsible Required Forms',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Name, Address, And Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Contact',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact First and Last Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Contact',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter First and Last Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Address',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Name',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Phone Number'
]

return categories.includes(data['deficiencyType'])

categories = [
  'Parent STN was not found in the CTP eSubmissions database',
  'Parent STN was not provided for the received amendment',
  'Submission contains broken hyperlinks',
  'Submission contains incompatible file types extensions',
  'Submission contains Zero Byte File Size'
]

return categories.includes(data['deficiencyType'])

severities = [
  'PDF Attachment is Password Protected',
  'PMTA Document Page Count 20 or less',
  'Premarket submission contains PDF attachments in Non-English language',
  'Premarket Submission is missing Responsible Official Signatures',
  'Premarket Submission is missing Responsible Required Forms',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Name, Address, and Phone Number',   
  'Premarket submission missing Authorized Representative Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Name, Address, And Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Company Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Contact',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer of Imported Products Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Manufacturer/Packaging Sites Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact First and Last Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Point of Contact Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Contact',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Predicate Manufacturer Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Address',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter First and Last Name',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing Submitter Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Address',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Name',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Name, Address, and Phone Number',
  'Premarket submission missing US Agent Phone Number',
  'Processing On Hold - Requires Additional Information',
  'Submission contains files that pose a security risk',
  'Submission contains incompatible file types extensions'
]

return severities.includes(data['deficiencyType'])

severities = [
  'Parent STN was found in the CTP eSubmissions database in an inactive status',
  'Parent STN was not found in the CTP eSubmissions database',
  'Parent STN was not provided for the received amendment',
